duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and develop a governance and policy framework for the DWS Legal US department.
Lead general project management work and proactive problem analysis for data, reporting, and process gaps.
Coordinate and support the US Legal department in all aspects of Records Management, systems, and vendor management.
Provide DWS cost allocation overview, conducting cost reviews, reviewing KPIs, and monitoring budget against actual spend.
Manage systems used by the DWS Legal department in conjunction with IT and business line users.
Interface between the DWS lawyers and the DWS Legal Operations function responsible for invoice processing and legal cost reporting.

education_certification.credential: University degree in Applied Sciences or completed commercial training with appropriate further training (banking business administration, MBA, CFA, etc.).
